modName: Crimson Nirnroot tedious quest easy mode
descriptionHtml:
I found the quest tedious and boring, nice scenery tho\' ... Dunno if I\'m the only on with this but if not, here\'s a simple bat file for you, it makes the quest super easy... pick one root to start the quest.

Then, open the console.. button left of 1 --> ยง

bat nirnquest

BAM! some nice thief came and planted 30 roots in your pockets... you can even have for snack the one extra if your an alchemist or similar.

\" \" extract the .txt to Skyrim installation folder \" \"
author: weedoz
